rows.label: tev010101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Adelbert about Division Drive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_SEL0021
rows.name: Find out what Adelbert is upset about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Adelbert about the Harriers.

rows.label: tev010101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Adelbert about tyrants.

rows.label: tev010101_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Adelbert about your affinity with your comrades.

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0001
rows.name:
It isn't just a base for us Harriers—lots of divisions
have their headquarters here on Division Drive.
...Hence the name, I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0002
rows.name:
The Pathfinders are right next door to us,
and the Mediators are across the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0003
rows.name:
You just arrived here, right? Then I take it you haven't
chosen a division yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0004
rows.name:
You'll see logos like this one on the walls and floors of
each division's base.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0005
rows.name:
When you decide on a division, look for the building
with its logo. A division base is like a BLADE's second
home—a place where you and your friends can gather.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0010
rows.name:
After we landed here, a young whelp by the name of
Dirk was assigned to our team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0011
rows.name: Kid's so green, he smells like fresh-cut grass.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0012
rows.name:
Harrier work is dangerous even at the best of times,
and I worry the kid won't be able to hack it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0013
rows.name:
Apparently he was some sort of expert marksman in
college, but we're not shooting hay bales here.
I don't know how he'll perform in a real fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Still, as team leader, I have to take responsibility for
keeping him safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0020
rows.name:
As Harriers, our job is to exterminate the especially
dangerous indigens that roam this world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0021
rows.name:
Some of 'em are so tough, it would take a full squad
of BLADEs just to make it a fair fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0022
rows.name:
Most of the Coalition's veteran fighters were assigned
to this division.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0023
rows.name:
On my own team, I'm lucky to serve with Phina and
Grette—two career soldiers that may well have been
born wearing camo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0024
rows.name:
They both have mouths that would make a sailor blush,
but there's no one you'd rather have watching your
back when you're bringing down a monster.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Oh, I got some stories. There's a mutant dilus that
lives just north of Rust Lake in Noctilum, for one.
It's an unimaginably vicious piece of work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0031
rows.name:
We pumped that thing full of enough lead to supply
a pencil factory, and it STILL wouldn't go down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0032
rows.name:
Eventually it went berserk—got even stronger than
before. Turned into a flurry of death and destruction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0033
rows.name:
I wouldn't be here talking to you today if it weren't
for Phina and Grette—two buddies I've been serving
with since my Coalition days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0034
rows.name:
Tyrants are in a whole different league from normal
indigens. If you're thinking of challenging one, you
better make damn sure you know what you're doing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0040
rows.name:
Since we arrived, I've racked up lots of combat ops
with Phina and Grette—two allies I trust with my life.
The more we fight, the stronger our affinity becomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0041
rows.name:
As a result, we're an order of magnitude stronger
whenever we fight together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0042
rows.name:
Affinity is the strongest weapon you have, and more
powerful than any piece of gear you can buy—
including a Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010101_MSG0043
rows.name:
When you're fighting alongside Elma and the other
trusted comrades on your team, it's a weapon you all
must forge together.[ST:wait ]
